com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont

Class BitmapFontPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anyicomplex.gdx.tools.bmfont.BitmapFontPacker

  • public class BitmapFontPacker
extends java.lang.Object

    BitmapFont packer library based on libGDX's FreeType wrapper.

    NOTE should be used after libGDX initialization.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public static int process(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle inputFile,
                          com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle outputDir,
                          BitmapFontPacker.Configuration config)
        Process the input file into BitmapFont to the output directory, if the file exists, override it.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the FreeType supported font file
        outputDir - the BitmapFont output directory
        config - the processor configuration
        Returns:
        exit code
        See Also:
        process(FileHandle, FileHandle, Configuration, boolean)
